sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.wfCMSHideSections</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>wfCMSHideSections</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var wfCMSHideSections = Class.create();
wfCMSHideSections.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
    hideDmnSections: function() {
        var cmsUnit = gs.getProperty('wf.spm.business.unit');
        var chgtype = this.getParameter('sysparm_chgtype');
        var busUnit = this.getParameter('sysparm_busUnit');

        if ((chgtype != '') && (busUnit == cmsUnit)) {
            return true;
        } else
            return false;

    },


    hidePrjSections: function() {
        var cmsUnit = gs.getProperty('wf.spm.business.unit');
        var chgtype = this.getParameter('sysparm_chgtype');
        var busUnit = this.getParameter('sysparm_busUnit');

        if ((chgtype != '') && (busUnit == cmsUnit)) {
            return true;
        } else
            return false;

    },



    type: 'wfCMSHideSections'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>K095239</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-12-19 06:35:53</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>a3c9bd40475f7950e4707f84f16d43f6</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>wfCMSHideSections</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_a3c9bd40475f7950e4707f84f16d43f6</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2024-02-04 17:26:21</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
